"Thank you for being here, everyone.":
"This is the day we've
all been preparing for."

"To defeat the one that massacred Aelio Town
with merciless blades of light."
"Today, we defeat Dark Falz."

"Right now, he is likely hiding in another dimension,
mending the wounds he received from the Central Cannon."

"However, he cannot fully heal without
using that docking station in Stia."

"Sooner or later, he will have to
reappear in this world."
"...That's when we'll attack."

"The completed Central Cannon can be
used for long periods of time."

"The barrel can now withstand
multiple shots in a row."

"However, it still takes considerable time
until it's actually ready to fire."

"Try as we might, we haven't been
able to shorten its boot sequence."

"When Dark Falz appears, I'm going to need you to
stall him until the Cannon's ready."

"You all stand here today
having overcome many hardships."

"Dark Falz is a being that goes
far beyond anything we can imagine."

"Even if we're perfectly prepared for this,
there's no telling what could happen."

"However, even if things don't
go according to plan..."

"I believe we'll be able to
deal with it, come what may."
"Aelio..."
"Retem..."
"Kvaris..."

"And now ARKS from Stia, all
working together, hand-in-hand."

"As far as I know, this has never happened
before in the history of Halpha."

"Halpha has finally
united together as one."

"So, if we want to continue
fostering these good relations..."

"Then this battle is one we
absolutely cannot afford to lose."

"This is something that will
require everyone's strength."

"Please remain vigilant until
you receive orders to deploy."
"May victory be ours!"
